author: AngelCalvo
body:
- [ ] Resolves issue #abcd.
- [ ] Code is [rebased](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/docs/git/README.md#sync-your-local-repo) on `origin/master`.
- [ ] Add tests that fail without your changes.
- [ ] Update all relevant [documentation](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/tree/master/docs).

comments.author: AngelCalvo
comments.body: Added a "Wellcome to the the Community"

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: This was merged without the review issues being fixed. I've updated the readme directly to fix both issues, but this should not have been merged.

title: Update README.md
